summary: More Lore-Friendly version of Super Ale. This is a generic Ale replacement that increases carrying capacity by 250 for 4 hours.
descriptionHtml:
This plug-in is a more Lore Friendly version of Super Ale, a generic Ale replacement called Celtic Special Stout that increases your carrying capacity by 250 for 4 hours. It is more expensive and the effect is lower, with a duration decrease. 
For the full power of Super Ale, go here:
 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11035
Only one of these will work at time. 

Install:
Download and extract to: C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data or where ever your Skyrim/Data file is located.
Uninstall:
Delete the file SuperAleLF.esp 

I don\'t think these files will install with NMM, however you can control them from the NMM interface.
author: Merrydeath
